Text:
The DeAndre Way is the upcoming third major label and fourth overall studio album 
by American rapper Soulja Boy Tell 'Em. It is set to be released on November 30, 
2010. He also plans to release his novel, Teenage Millionaire, on the album's 
release day. Soulja Boy stated the album will be the "biggest album of his career. 
He plans to go on The DeAndre Way Tour after the album is released. A deluxe edition 
with four bonus tracks plus a DVD will be released on the same day... :P

---
